item.description:
A sunny weekday hike! Are you hiking the New Hampshire 52 with a View list? A good goal, and all the hikes have a rewarding view. Both Chocorua and Three Sisters is on the list and a moderate hike that can be enjoyed by most fit hikers.

Mt. Chocorua (3475') has a bare rock summit which gives you spectacular view on the southern White Mountain peaks, we will do a big loop which covers the Three Sister and Mt. Chocorua, this will include a 1.5 mile hike on the ledge which will be awesome in a sunny day (don't forget sunscreen!)



All hikers should review the hike plans here and on your trail map.
Total Book Time: total elevation gain: 2700', total distance: about 8.5 miles. Book time will vary with the size of the group(s) and ability levels.

We will be starting at the starting at Champney Falls Trailhead and returning the same route.

  • hike 0.07 mi/2 min/+9 ft on the Champney Falls Trail to the junction of Bolles Trail

  • hike 1.33 mi/55 min/+477 ft on the Champney Falls Trail to the junction of Champney Falls loop

  • hike 1.60 mi/1 hr 26 min/+1268 ft on the Champney Falls Trail to the junction of Middle Sister Cutoff

  • hike 0.15 mi/9 min/+163 ft on the Champney Falls Trail to the junction of Middle Sister Trail


  • hike 0.05 mi/2 min/-3 ft on the Champney Falls Trail to the junction of Piper Trail

  • hike 0.20 mi/8 min/+29 ft on the Piper Trail Then the West Side Trail (part of the original Liberty Trail bridle path) enters on the right to the junction of West Side Trail

  • hike 0.48 mi/22 min/+208 ft on the Piper Trail to the junction of Brook Trail

  • hike 0.02 mi/2 min/+60 ft on the Piper Trail to Mt Chocorua

    Totals
    Distance 3.90 mi
    Time 3 hr 6 min
    Elev Gain +2333 ft
    Elev Loss -120 ft
    Elev Change +2212 ft


    For the Three Sisters This short trail—which has also been signed as the Middle Sister Cutoff in the past—leads from the Champney Falls Trail to the col between Middle Sister and First Sister, giving access to the fine views from the old tower site on Middle Sister. Itinerary

    starting at the junction of Champney Falls Trail and Middle Sister Cutoff

  • hike 0.30 mi/16 min/+220 ft on the Middle Sister Cut off to the junction of Middle Sister Trail

Totals
Distance 0.30 mi
Time 16 min
Elev Gain +225 ft
Elev Loss -5 ft
Elev Change +220 ft

Return the same route to parking lot
Total Book Time: total elevation gain: 2700', total distance: about 8.5 miles. Book time will vary with the size of the group(s) and ability levels.



You must have the following gear:

Headlamp: It is recommended that you have one, The days are getting shorter and any delays could have us finishing by headlamp.

Clothing: Light-weight to mid-weight synthetic shirt/pants - no jeans or cotton sweat shirt/pants. We will hike on a exposed part so bring your wind jacket and pants. Pack a fleece layer, and wear good hiking boots.

Outerwear: Wind breaker, cap
Food and Water: Sandwich, high-energy snacks and at least 3 quarts of water.

Other Gear: Sunscreen and insect repellent .

Anything more than a brief rain shower cancels. We will post any event changes by Tuesday 3pm before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Gigi will be leading this hike Email Gigi at missgigi01844@gmail.com
item.name: WEEKDAY HIKE: Mt. Chocorua (3475') and Three Sisters
